text: Eileen Fulton (born September 13, 1933), is an American actress. She is known for her television role as Lisa Grimaldi on the CBS soap opera As the World Turns, which she would star from May 18, 1960 until the show's ending on September 17, 2010. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Interview with Eileen Fulton for the Archive of American Television Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:People from Asheville, North Carolina
title: Eileen Fulton
